conclusion: Violation of Art. 2 (substantive aspect);Violation of Art. 2 (procedural aspect);Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - award
issue: Sections 42(1)(4) and 42(1)(5) of the 1993 National Police Act ; Article 12a of the Criminal Code
